hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT PROPOSITION_ID, CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ORGANISATION_ID, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, GAIN_SAVINGS, TANGIBLE_RESULTS FROM CRM_PROPOSITION WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO CRM_PROPOSITION ( PROPOSITION_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ORGANISATION_ID, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID, GAIN_SAVINGS, TANGIBLE_RESULTS ) VALUES ( ${PROPOSITION_ID}, ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${ORGANISATION_ID}, ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, ${GAIN_SAVINGS}, ${TANGIBLE_RESULTS} )

UPDATE CRM_PROPOSITION SET CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ORGANISATION_ID = ${ORGANISATION_ID}, BUSINESS_GROUP_ID = ${BUSINESS_GROUP_ID}, GAIN_SAVINGS = ${GAIN_SAVINGS}, TANGIBLE_RESULTS = ${TANGIBLE_RESULTS} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
